Package org.strongback.hardware

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Hardware
    The factory methods that will create component implementations corresponding to physical hardware on the robot.
    Hardware.Accelerometers
    Factory method for accelerometers.
    Hardware.AngleSensors
    Factory method for angle sensors.
    Hardware.Controllers
    Factory method for hardware-based controllers.
    Hardware.DistanceSensors
    Factory method for distance sensors.
    Hardware.HumanInterfaceDevices  
    Hardware.Motors
    Factory method for different kinds of motors.
    Hardware.Solenoids
    Factory methods for solenoids.
    Hardware.Switches
    Factory method for different kinds of switches.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Hardware.Switches.AnalogOption
    Option for analog switches.
    Hardware.Switches.TriggerMode
    Trigger mode for analog switches.
